subject: Good Morning,
body:
Good Morning,
This is an urgent message and you should respond as soon as you receive this email.
I wish to let you know that you have been compensated by six Gift card companies whose name are below for patronizing them for a few years now and each company compensated you with the sum of $5,000 for Christmas.
(1) Apple Card
(2) Steam Wallet
(3) Google play
(4) American Express
(5) Nordstrom
(6) Amazon
(7) eBay
(8) Sephora
Kindly respond back with your names and phone number and also provide your Bank account details where your money will be sent to and your total money is $40,000.00.
Remember that you are to pay $50 for claiming charge.
Regard
Kristalina Georgieva

subject: Re:   Good Morning,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your message. It's quite exciting to hear about this opportunity! I'm curious, how did these companies come to select me for such a generous gift?

Also, could you please explain more about the claiming charge? What does it cover exactly?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Daniel
